channel.title: Compiler errors, how do i fix them?!

item.title: Compiler errors, how do i fix them?!
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

Compiling…

given types;

found: int
reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length
